content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. While discussing the rental price for this prime München location, let me emphasize every opportunity to maximize my return on investment. Startingly low offers may not receive my consideration. I'm looking forward to exploring a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I would like to rent the apartment for 500 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I regret to say, but I don't want to continue the negotiation, because this proposed price significantly undervalues the property's worth in this highly sought-after area.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, I will increase the offer. I would like to rent the apartment for 700 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I find your revised offer more appealing. However, let's explore one final push to reach a mutually advantageous figure. I agree to the price of 750 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
